mapper.insert: insert into parking_info_statistics_findcar( user_id, `map`, place, placeName, start_time, end_time) values (#{userId},#{map},#{place},#{placename},#{startTime},#{endTime})
insert into parking_info_statistics_recommend( user_id, `map`, place, placeName, start_time, end_time) values (#{userId},#{map},#{place},#{placename},#{startTime},#{endTime})
insert into parking_info_statistics_use(user_id, `map`, place, placeName, start_time, end_time) values (#{userId},#{map},#{place},#{placename},#{startTime},#{endTime})
